marketplaces.name: jaz-plugins
marketplaces.description: Jaz/Juan accounting platform skills for AI agents and humans
marketplaces.repo_description: Jaz skills for Claude Code, Cowork, and any agents using the Jaz API to build, automate, or execute workflows. Includes extended support for regional localizations.

files.README.md:
# Jaz AI

Every endpoint, every field name, every error code, every production gotcha, every conversion edge case — directly inside the AI that builders, automators, and developers are already using to get things done. A Claude Code plugin for [Jaz](https://jaz.ai) and [Juan](https://juan.ac) accounting platforms. ## Skills | Skill | What It Does | |-------|-------------| | **api** | 55 rules, full endpoint catalog, error catalog, field mapping. Agents write correct Jaz API code on the first try instead of guessing | | **conversion** | Xero, QuickBooks, Sage, Excel migration playbook. CoA mapping, tax profiles, FX, clearing accounts, trial balance verification | ## Installation ### Using CLI (Recommended) ```bash # Install CLI globally npm install -g jaz-cli # Go to your project cd /path/to/your/project # Install both skills jaz init # Or install a specific skill jaz init --skill api jaz init --skill conversion ``` ### Using Claude Marketplace ``` /plugin marketplace add teamtinvio/claude-plugins /plugin install jaz-ai@jaz-plugins ``` ### Other CLI Commands ```bash jaz versions # List available versions jaz update # Update to latest version jaz --help # Show all commands ``` ## Usage Skills activate automatically when you or your agent work with Jaz/Juan API code or data conversion tasks. Just describe what you need: ### API Skill ``` Create an invoice with 3 line items and 7% GST Build a payment for invoice INV-001 in USD Query all overdue bills with pagination Set up chart of accounts for a Singapore company ``` ### Conversion Skill ``` Convert this Xero trial balance export to Jaz Migrate QuickBooks aged receivables to conversion invoices Map this Excel chart of accounts to Jaz CoA structure Verify the trial balance after conversion ``` ## What's Inside ### API Skill (`api`) | Reference | Lines | Content | |-----------|-------|---------| | `SKILL.md` | 162 | 55 critical rules — auth, IDs, dates, FX, payments, field aliases | | `endpoints.md` | 1,299 | Request/response examples for every core endpoint | | `errors.md` | 751 | Error catalog with root causes and fixes | | `field-map.md` | 428 | Intuitive name -> actual field name mapping | | `search-reference.md` | 714 | Filter fields, sort fields, operators for 28 search endpoints | | `full-api-surface.md` | 699 | Complete endpoint catalog (80+), enums, limits | | `dependencies.md` | 139 | Resource creation order (currencies -> CoA -> transactions) | | `feature-glossary.md` | 216 | Business context per feature | ### Conversion Skill (`conversion`) | Reference | Content | |-----------|---------| | `SKILL.md` | Conversion domain knowledge, clearing account pattern, FX handling | | `mapping-rules.md` | CoA, contact, and tax code mapping rules | | `option1-full.md` | Full conversion workflow (all transactions FY + FY-1) | | `option2-quick.md` | Quick conversion workflow (opening balances at FYE) | | `file-types.md` | Supported file formats and detection heuristics | | `edge-cases.md` | Platform-specific quirks (Sage 300 preambles, Xero rounding) | | `verification.md` | Trial balance comparison and verification checklist | | `file-analysis.md` | Excel/CSV structure analysis and smart detection | ## Architecture ``` .claude-plugin/ ├── plugin.json Plugin manifest └── marketplace.json Marketplace catalog .claude/skills/ ├── api/ API reference skill │ ├── SKILL.md 55 critical rules │ └── references/ 7 detailed reference files └── conversion/ Data conversion skill ├── SKILL.md Conversion domain knowledge └── references/ 7 reference files src/skills/ Source of truth (symlinked by .claude/skills/) ``` ## Common API Gotchas Mistakes the skill prevents — for agents and humans alike: | Gotcha | Wrong | Right | |--------|-------|-------| | Auth header | `Authorization: Bearer ...` | `x-jk-api-key: ...` | | ID field | `id` | `resourceId` | | Date field | `issueDate`, `date` | `valueDate` | | FX currency | `currencyCode: "USD"` | `currency: { sourceCurrency: "USD" }` | | Org endpoint | `{ data: [...] }` | `{ data: { ... } }` (single object) | | Payments | `[{ ... }]` | `{ payments: [{ ... }] }` (wrapped) | ## License [MIT](LICENSE) - Copyright (c) 2026 Tinvio / Jaz

plugins.name: jaz-ai
plugins.description: Every endpoint, field name, error code, and production gotcha for Jaz/Juan — directly inside your AI agent. API reference + data conversion playbook + 16 transaction recipes + 10 CLI financial calculators (IFRS-compliant math with journal entries, workings, and execution blueprints).
